original_text: It will be very bad for you Pharisees! When you grow spices to cook with food, you give a tenth part of these small things to God. You are right to obey this rule. But you do not do the most important things. You do not help people in a good way. You do not really love God. You should have done the important things as well as the other little things.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 너희 바리새인이여 너희가 박하와 운향과 모든 채소의 십일조는 드리되 공의와 하나님께 대한 사랑은 버리는도다 그러나 이것도 행하고 저것도 버리지 말아야 할지니라

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you Pharisees!
When you grow spices to cook with food,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 음식에 쓸 향료를 재배할 때,

sentences.original_text: you give a tenth part of these small things to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 이 작은 것들의 십일조를 하나님께 바친다.

sentences.original_text: You are right to obey this rule.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 이 규칙을 지키는 것은 옳다.

sentences.original_text: But you do not do the most important things.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너희는 가장 중요한 일들을 하지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: You do not help people in a good way.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 올바른 방식으로 사람들을 도와주지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: You do not really love God.
You should have done the important things
as well as the other little things.
